markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Master Spotter](/Feats.aspx?ID=3124) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 51</row>

**Archetype** [Overwatch](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=109)

**Prerequisites**
[Overwatch Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3118); expert in Perception

</column>

---

Your incredible perception and trusty enhanced visual gear allow you to see things others miss. Your proficiency rank in Perception increases to master.
name: Master Spotter
